name: Disarming Creature (V)
Lore: 'Luke''s defensive maneuver put him out of arm''s way.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Skull is destiny +2.  Once per game, may deploy one Tauntaun Bones from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  You may play I Thought They Smelled Bad On The Outside as follows: ''USED: Lose 1 Force to take a creature (except Nudj), creature vehicle, or Beast-Rider into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.'' (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
